1. Go to the Forum and click on "Register Your free account"
  2. Click on the “EZ “ image under global account.
  3. Fill out the form.
  4. They will send an email that you must open and click on in order to activate your account.
  5. Click on the the Login button on the forum to log in.
  6. You will remain logged in even when you close your browser unless you click the logout button.
  7. Go to "my control center" to edit changes.
A Step by Step Guide to Registering for our Forum
While you do not have to be registered with EZBoard to use our forum, it certainly helps! It allows you to use a myriad of features, including custom signatures, participation in polls and a way to keep track of new posts!
http://pub135.ezboard.com/bexodusfellowshipforum
We are working with a site located at:

but you should be able to access the forum and all it's features directly through our own website.
If not, please try using the above address.
If you are having trouble staying logged in or using the password protected forums,
please make sure your browser is set to accept cookies. You may have to set it at the lowest setting of "accept all cookies"

Also, make sure you are not set at High Security within your EZBoard preferences.
Go to your "My Contol Center" after you are logged in. Click on "Edit Preferences"
Toward the bottom of the right column is a box marked "High Security"
Make sure that it is NOT checked.
Always make sure you hit the button,"Save Changes" when finished.
For more troubleshooting tips using the forum, please
click here.
